subject: Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Landon Donovan announced that he would retire at the end of the M.L.S. season, but it will be a while before the United States sees another player like him.
snippet: Landon Donovan announced that he would retire at the end of the M.L.S. season, but it will be a while before the United States sees another player like him.
